data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Solter Navás, 1912 for Maghreb and West Africa with descriptions of five new species (Neuroptera, Myrmeleontidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Michel, Bruno (2014): A revision of the genus Solter Navás, 1912 for Maghreb and West Africa with descriptions of five new species (Neuroptera, Myrmeleontidae). Zootaxa 3887 (5): 529-554, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3887.5.2
